HOME.TITLE: Welcome
HOME.DESCRIPTION: I'm Freddy Ojeda, a somewhat creative fullstack developer.

ABOUT.TITLE: Who am I?
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: I'm Freddy Ojeda, a young man passionate about various fields such as sports, culture, dance, and especially programming and development. I am currently studying Systems and Computing Engineering at the Pedagogical and Technological University of Colombia, from my hometown, Sogamoso, Boyacá. Throughout my studies, I have discovered a deep interest in web development and audiovisual media, and I still have much to explore in similar fields. I consider myself someone who balances both professional and personal life, always in search of new challenges. I enjoy exploring new things, integrating each experience with what I have already learned. I don't know how far I will go, but I am sure that each day I will be closer to reaching my goals, which grow day by day.

HISTORY.TITLE: How Has My Journey Been So Far?

EVENT_1.TITLE: University Enrollment
EVENT_1.DESCRIPTION: On this date, I began studying Systems and Computing Engineering at UPTC, Sogamoso campus.

EVENT_2.TITLE: Start in the Workforce
EVENT_2.DESCRIPTION: Joined a company in the engineering field, working remotely as a junior full-stack developer.

EVENT_3.TITLE: Artificial Intelligence BootCamp
EVENT_3.DESCRIPTION: Started classes in an AI bootcamp promoted by TalentoTech and taught at Sergio Arboleda University.

EVENT_4.TITLE: End of My First Work Experience
EVENT_4.DESCRIPTION: My contract as a junior full-stack developer ended.

EVENT_5.TITLE: My First Physical Diploma
EVENT_5.DESCRIPTION: Successfully completed and graduated from the AI bootcamp.

PROJECTS.TITLE: Published Projects
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION: These are the most relevant projects I have developed, each with different goals.

PROJECT_1.TITLE: Marketplace Platform
PROJECT_1.DESCRIPTION: An online platform for entrepreneurs looking to increase the reach of their products.

PROJECT_2.TITLE: Social Network Prototipe
PROJECT_2.DESCRIPTION: A full-featured social network app with real-time messaging and notifications.

PROJECT_3.TITLE: Process Management Tool
PROJECT_3.DESCRIPTION: A tool to manage teams and process, track progress, and collaborate efficiently, focus on sport context.
